]]> Brakkton Booker Speaker Paul Ryan Calls Donald Trump Meeting 'Encouraging' House Speaker Paul Ryan met with the de facto nominee of the Republican Party Donald Trump Thursday and called the conversation encouraging and a good first step, while acknowledging that the two have legitimate policy differences. Thu, 12 May 2016 16:30:00 -0400 http://www.npr.org/2016/05/12/477835971/speaker-paul-ryan-calls-donald-trump-meeting-encouraging?utm_medium=RSS&utm_campaign=politics http://www.npr.org/2016/05/12/477835971/speaker-paul-ryan-calls-donald-trump-meeting-encouraging?utm_medium=RSS&utm_campaign=politics House Speaker Paul Ryan met with the de facto nominee of the Republican Party Donald Trump Thursday and called the conversation encouraging and a good first step, while acknowledging that the two have legitimate policy differences.

]]> Susan Davis White House Request For Emergency Zika Funding Hits Roadblock In Congress The Obama administration requested $1.9 billion in emergency funding to prepare against the Zika virus. Congressional Republicans say the administration doesn't need all that money now and insist the White House is asking for a blank check.
